(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props) → {JSX.Element}

Description:

  • SettingsCard component renders a card with settings items.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the card.
items Object

The items to display in the card.
Returns:

The rendered component.

Type
JSX.Element

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />

Name Type Description

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

            "Dark mode": {

            },
          }}
        />

Name Type Description

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

  • SettingsCard component renders a card with settings items.

Parameters:

The items to display in the card.
Returns:

The rendered component.

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.

(inner) SettingsCard(props)

Description:

  • A reusable settings card component that displays a list of settings items.

Example
return (
  <SettingsCard
          header="Display"
          items={{
            "Dark mode": {
              label: theme,
              link: () => setActiveForm("darkMode"),
            },
          }}
        />
Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object

The component props.

Properties
Name Type Description
header string

The header text for the settings card.
items Object

The list of settings items to display, where the key is the setting name
and the value has two items : label and link. label is the setting value. link is optional if a a setting can redirect to another page.
